Course Schedule

ECON2110G | Spring 2026 | 16 Weeks

16-Week Course Schedule

Course Start Date: January 21, 2026
Instructor: Dr. Meghan Downes
Textbook: Principles of Macroeconomics (Latest Edition) by Cowen & Tabarrock

Important Dates

  • Classes Begin: Wednesday, January 22, 2026
  • Spring Break: March 15-23, 2026
  • Final Day of Classes: Wednesday, May 14, 2026
  • Project Presentations: May 5-7, 2026

Notes

  • All class worksheets should be named: MMDD-topic-ws.qmd
  • Submit all worksheets via [course management system]
  • Notebook entries should be reflective and ongoing throughout the semester
  • Project presentations are mandatory for all students
